scripts.start: npm run env:restart && npm run cc:start -- energymarket
scripts.cc:start: f() { npm run cc:package -- $1 org1; npm run cc:install $1; }; f
scripts.cc:upgrade: f() { npm run cc:package -- $1 org1; hurl upgrade $1 node $2  -P ./chaincode-$1; }; f
scripts.cc:start:debug: f() { npm run cc:package -- $1 org1; npm run cc:install:debug $1; }; f
scripts.user:fingerprint: f () { node -e "console.log(JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('$1', 'utf8')).enrollment.identity.certificate)" | openssl x509 -fingerprint -noout | cut -d '=' -f2 ; }; f
scripts.cc:package: f() { npm run lerna:build; chaincode-manager --update --config ./$2.$1.config.json --output ./chaincode-$1 package; }; f
